scripts.heroku-postbuild: concurrently "cd client && npm install && npm run build" "cd server && npm install && npm run index.js" "cd media-server && npm install && npm run media-server.js"
scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev
scripts.start:prod: cd client && npm start && cd server && npm start && cd media-server && npm start
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start" "cd media-server && npm start"
scripts.install: concurrently "cd server && npm i" "cd client && npm i" "cd media-server && npm i"
